Application Name: Azerbaijan National Art Museum.
Number of Reviews: 6.00.
Application Description: Welcome to the National Museum of Art !The Art Museum program contains a wide range of audio guides and was designed to inform each guest in detail about the various exhibits presented in the museum. Due to the multifunctionality of the program and the establishment of an age indicator, any guest of the museum can choose the appropriate program for him: Audio guide for adults or Audio guide for children.A separate and special place in the program is occupied by audio guides dedicated to the Azerbaijan national exhibits and providing rich information about them, starting from the year of their creation and ending with their historic journey through their native and foreign lands.Read moreCollapse.
